content.raw:
found a problem with missing collision visuals when loading a non-empty world with models. Fixed in 3b440e1. @chapulina I had to revert the changes in `Collision::FillMsg` otherwise gzclient doesn't get the collision visual msgs. We can figure out a way to move that logic to the client in a later pull request.

[homebrew](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/701/) - ok
content.html:
found a problem with missing collision visuals when loading a non-empty world with models. Fixed in 3b440e1. @chapulina I had to revert the changes in Collision::FillMsg otherwise gzclient doesn't get the collision visual msgs. We can figure out a way to move that logic to the client in a later pull request.

homebrew - ok

content.raw:
@scpeters showed me a problem:

1. Open Gazebo and View -> Joints

1. Insert several double pendulums

Some of the joint visuals for the pendulums will show up tiny. After some digging I found out that this is happening because the joint msg may be processed before the visual msgs. So when we get the link's bounding box to check its size and scale the joint visual, the box has size zero due to the lack of visuals. I'm trying to fix this.
content.html:
@scpeters showed me a problem:

  1. Open Gazebo and View -> Joints

  2. Insert several double pendulums

Some of the joint visuals for the pendulums will show up tiny. After some digging I found out that this is happening because the joint msg may be processed before the visual msgs. So when we get the link's bounding box to check its size and scale the joint visual, the box has size zero due to the lack of visuals. I'm trying to fix this.

content.raw: Did a fix here: 51ded8c, which relies on `ShowJoints` being called later. Seems not to break anything. Maybe it will be a problem once we support displaying dynamically created joints?
content.html: Did a fix here: 51ded8c, which relies on ShowJoints being called later. Seems not to break anything. Maybe it will be a problem once we support displaying dynamically created joints?
